metadata.title: CVE-2017-14868 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Restlet Framework before 2.3.11, when using SimpleXMLProvider, allowsremote attackers to access arbitrary files via an XXE attack in a REST APIHTTP request. This affects use of the Jax-rs extension.

criterions.comment: restlet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
